title: (x) Frame Magazine's serif font - Zapf International {Chris M}
content:
Does anyone have the information about the serif font used in body text and headlines in Frame Magazine ( [www.framemag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091103023718/http:/www.framemag.com/ "www.framemag.com")).

I can’t find it anywhere, maybe it’s a customized font for the magazine’s use only..?

Thanks in forehand,

Mike
author: Mike Tapping

comments.content: Mike, is it possible to scan a page from the magazine, because the cover on the website is tiny.

I’d really love to but for some reason I can’t make the attachment thing happen…

Mike

Hi Mike - download the media kit pdf from the site - the fonts used in that are listed - loads of them - a real type salad as we used to call it. I think the one you mean is Herman’s Zapf International. Chris Mitch

can you tell me where abouts where the font page is placed on the pdf, cant seem to find it..lol  
thanks
You can find list of fonts in a pdf at File-\>Properties (mac: apple D).
